content:
@Bob Coecke writes:

In our role as Senior Scientific Advisor for Cambridge Quantum Computing Ltd. we are hiring a Research Scientist in Quantum Natural Language Processing (QNLP), in order to push our unique compositional take on quantum AI. You'll be based at the new CQC offices in Oxford. You'll also work closely with the Cambridge CQC team led by Ross Duncan. We work with major hardware companies, and have family ties with the Oxford CS Dept, and the Topos institute. Here's the full add:

https://cambridgequantum.com/research-scientist-quantum-natural-language-processing-qnlp/

and hereâ€™s a blog-post on the stuff we do:

https://medium.com/cambridge-quantum-computing/quantum-natural-language-processing-748d6f27b31d
